name: file_change
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages Reference Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A file was changed Compatibility: RTM Events API The file_change event is sent when any property of a file is changed. It is sent to all connected clients for all users that have permission to see the file. The file property includes the file ID, as well as a top-level file_id. To obtain additional information about the file, use the files.info API method.
